comment.author: 76653656@N06
comment._content:
NEILL, MORTON
Rank:Private
Service No:17911
Date of Death:30/07/1916
Age:19
Regiment/Service:The King's (Liverpool Regiment)
 19th Bn. 
Panel ReferencePier and Face 1 D 8 B and 8 C.
MemorialTHIEPVAL MEMORIAL
Additional Information:
Son of Andrew Morton and Christina Neill, of 33, Burns Avenue, Wallasey, Cheshire.

comment.author: 76653656@N06
comment._content:
Morton Medal entitlement is the 1914-15 star having landed in France  7/11/1915.
The Brithish War Medal and the Victory Medal.

His name is on top of page 225 of Graham Maddocks book. 
By night fall of the 30th July total killed missing wounded or prisoner from the 3 Pals Bn 
42 Officers and 1,073 other ranks in 1 days fighting. Of the 19th Bn 11 Officers and 435other ranks.
